alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Flagler County through 530 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palm Coast, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Beverly Beach and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
